choices: John and Mike awake in a girls palm. (Authors Direction)
John awakes in a shoe. (May be written by anyone)
The machine backfired and shrunk anyone inside the building. (May be Written by)
1.content:
Every college student has dreams, some plausible and others......not much so until recently. It was a normal Tuesday at Lanesburg Tech. A college that offered degrees in anything from science all the way to restaurant management all the way to massage therapy. John was going for a restaurant degree. He always loved to cook and learning how to manage a restaurant effectively would help him greatly. John has had a perfect life so far, 20 years old, knows what he wants out of life, even not that bad looking either. But...one thing John has always wanted to change in his life was his love for women's feet. He wasn't the stereotypical foot fetishist, but he still got hard if he seen a girl in flip flops and such. This is why he was a little nervous of his friend Mike talking him into being apart of the shrinking demonstration.

Mike was told by John years ago of his fetish, and Mike figured this would help him out.

"Bro, just think how big everyone will be! Those chicks feet will be big enough for you to f*ck."
Mike promised John he'd get him into the girls dorms so he could just go to whichever girl's foot he wanted. John, even though nervous, couldn't pass this opportunity up. Especially since Mike is friends with the student in charge of this.

"All I need to do is sneek you into the Booth, shrink you, and bam! We get you to the girls dorm for a fun time."

A few hours since John was recalling the words of his friend Mike had passed. John met Mike at the schools back entrance where the head of the shrinking machine was waiting.

"Alright Mike, John. You guys will need 5 minutes for John to shrink completely." Said the Lead on the Shrinking project. "If you all get caught, its not my problem."

Mike and John made their way to the machine. John entered and waited. "You ready buddy 3..2..1 gah!"

What happens next?
1.title: Signed up and taken Away?

choices: Taylor Spits him out (Written by Anyone)
11.content:
John begins trying to wake up. His vision slowly coming back to him. As he tries to stand, he realizes how soft and warm the ground is. He looks over to see his friend Mike still out cold. John quickly ran to him, but suddenly stopped after he looked up.

John looked up and stared into the face of a goddess sized woman looking down on the two with a warm smile. John soon realized it was Taylor Smith from classes he has had before. Mike started to get up and quickly fell on his ass in terror.

"Hey boys." Said Taylor in her soft quite voice. " "You both are probably confused and scared at the moment huh?" She giggles slightly.

John let the shock where off and yelled "Why are we here both shrunk?"

Taylor must have heard John. She moved her hand with the two and placed them on the nightstand across from the bed. From what John could tell, they were in her hotel room. A TV played softly in the background as both if them watched Taylor lay over on her stomach to face them the best she could from the bed. John watched as her perfectly tan body moved into position.

In the seconds they waited for Taylor to get comfortable, John's mind raced on how and why they were here. Taylor was not a close friend, but they have talked before. John never asked her out for he was afraid he'd get turned down. Taylor was shy and oddly so. 6,1 perfect tan, long brunette hair with long legs to match. Only down side of her was her small breasts, but that's not a big down side. John thought he would have a chance with her, but that foot fetish of his was sure to embarrass him.

Taylor was now facing the two of them. She then began to explain what is going on.

"I am sorry to scare you both. But when I asked the guy running the shrinking device about if I could have a shrunk guy, and he told me that you two were trying to get yourselves shrunk, I paid him off to get me both of you."

"WHAT!" Mike yelled. "It was only John shrinking! And I was pushing the...wait I was pushed!"

"Calm down Mike, lets see why she wants us first."

"You are always the positive thinker aren't yah!" Mike replied miffed.

John then asked Taylor "So why do you want us here?"

Taylor blushed as she tried to answer. "I...have. this fantasy of....having a guy inside me..all of him."

"This might be good after all!" Mike screamed in enjoyment.

John realised something is up. "So, what exactly are we going to do?"

"Well, since I am wanting to live out my fantasy, if you both have one, I can try to accommodate it." Taylor said happily.

Mike quickly blurted out "BITCH, ALL I WANT IS TO BE INSIDE YOU!"

John facepalmed himself in embarrassment.

"Alright then." Taylor said with a somewhat sinister smile.

Taylor then sat up in an Indian style position. She reached for Mike and dangled him infront of her face.

"What are you doing!" Mike screamed "I want inside you!"

Taylor licked her lips and said "As do I." Taylor then tilted her head back, her tongue glistening from the light from the lamp and TV; Mike struggled, but soon Taylor let go of him and he fell into her mouth.
11.title: Should Have Paid off the Guy who got you There.

choices: "In a way, yes I do." (Author's Direction)
111.content:
John watched on as Taylor sat there tossing his best friend about her mouth. Saliva smacking against her lips and Mike filled the sound barrier of the room.

"STOP! TAYLOR PLEASE! DON'T EAT HIM!"

"BITCH! I DARE YOU TO EAT ME! YOU DON'T HAVE THE GUTS!

John heard his friend dare her to eat him. "His ego never quits." John thought.

In that moment, Taylor then paused. GULP.

A sigh of relief and pleasure came from Taylor as Mike was pushed down into the depths of her body; she could hear him curse her all the way down.

John froze as Taylor's gaze locked on him.

"You must think I'm a monster John." She said to him in a now depressed voice.
"You...you ate him." John replied still in shock.

Taylor than began to cry. "I'm sorry OK! Its just....I have always dreamed of this day since..forever. *sobs*.......do you know why I never hang out with many people John? Because, If I spend much time with them, this..fantasy creeps its way into my head with them in it. I feel like a freak."

John just stood there and watched this giant woman cry over devouring his best friend. He actually felt bad in a way. After all, he was always shy with women, because he didn't want anyone to know of his love of feet.

"You probably don't understand any of this do you *sobs."

John replied.....
111.title: Strange Feelings

1111.content:
Taylor looked at John in shock;tears still actually falling down her cheek, she sat still and awaited his explanation.

"I have had a foot fetish all my life. With it, I have had a hard time dating women since I have been afraid they would find it weird. Its....difficult for me to understand why you get pleasure from eating shrunk guys, but you probably feel the same about me liking feet."

Taylor perked up abit and said, "John, can't really say its weird compared to my turn ons. I...am sorry for eating Mike so...I will just bring you to the machine and grow you back."

"Really?" John said happily

Taylor grew a smile on her face, "Or...we trade desires. I will let you rub my feet for one hour on each foot.....if......you agree to willingly walk into my mouth and let me swallow you."

John watched as Taylor seductively and slowly moved her feet into his view. "Is it worth it?"he thought "Her feet are beautiful, but do I want to be her food?"

Taylor knew he was thinking about it. She smiled as she awaited his decision.
1111.title: What is more important?

11111.content:
"Taylor." John paused for a moment thinking of words to say.
"I cannot lie that, your feet are amazingly attractive as the rest of you. But, I also do not want to be eaten; however, that in mind this is a once in a life time opportunity for me. I think I will regret this later, but Taylor.." John paused one last time to gather his thoughts. " If getting to touch your feet means I must enter as a willing morsel into your goddess like body, I will do so."

Taylor squealed with excitement. She quickly grabbed John off the night stand and brought him to her face.
"John, just think. After all this is over, you will be used to energize all of me, including what you love most." Taylor giggled.
John then was placed at the foot of Taylor's bed;he soon saw her giant legs swing around and soon her feet stood infront of him. John walked over to the left foot first and realized he was as tall as her heel. John realized he will still will be able to be swallowed in one gulp by Taylor, but that did not matter now. The very faint odor of vanilla lotion combined with Taylor's skin filled John's nose. He reached out and began to rub Taylor's left foot. He sometimes between rubbing would kiss her foot which Taylor felt and would giggle.

Two hours went in seconds as John was picked up and was being dangled in front of Taylor's face as Mike was just hours ago.

"That was the best massage I've ever had! I hope more guys I plan to eat rub as good as you." Taylor laughs.

John watched Taylor's mouth as she laughed. Soon, that warm and fleshy pit would be his new destination.

"I've decided since you have had so much fun at my feet, I will just put you in my mouth myself. Least I could do haha. Any last thoughts or..."

John replied "Taylor, after spending time massaging your feet, I have thought this over. Part of me wants to live, but.."

"But" Taylor responded in confusion.

"With how magnificent look and the way you said I will be part of you, some part of me wants this."

Taylor slowly puckered her lips and kissed John.

"Well, I do have that effect on boys, always wanting inside me haha."

"I am ready Taylor." Said John "Just if you will, toss me around your mouth awhile. Enjoy me as much as I enjoyed your feet."

"John." Taylor said than tilted her head back while licking her lips "I actually dreampt of eating you and since then have wanted to for so long. Trust me when I tell you, you will be enjoyed till you fully digest."

John watched as Taylor's mouth opened wide. Her tongue shining from the light in the room. Warm, slightly minty breathe blew onto John as he was held above her mouth.

"YOU ARE MY GODDESS!" John yelled in hopes it would make Taylor even more happy.

"I know." Taylor giggled

In that moment, John was lowered into her mouth. Every second, his view was filled with Taylor's ever approaching mouth. He then fell onto her tongue. Not even a second went by as Taylor quickly began to thrash John about her mouth. Moans of pleasure from Taylor and the sloshing of saliva filled John's ears. "At least we both found our happiness." John thought. The pleasure they have given each other this night, is indescribable.

After ten minutes of savory John, Taylor began to have second thoughts about eating him. While John was still in her mouth, she asked "Did you really mean part of you wants this? I feel so bad going through with this."

John yelled out "WE HAD A DEAL REMEMBER. NO REGRETS."

"Thank you." Taylor said as she she swallowed John.

Taylor layed down and stared at her stomach for a time. "Best boyfriend ever." She said to herself.
11111.title: John gives in

11113.content:
John started thinking really hard about his choice until another choice hit him, “What if we buy the shrink machine and I get her people to eat? Maybe if I do this, she’ll still reward me and I don’t have to be eaten”.

John looks up to Taylor and explains his plan. “What if I were to buy the shrink gun and use it on bad people like… Mark Camron? He bullies me a lot and I already know he deals hardcore drugs like meth outside college to people who can’t help themselves,” Taylor sat back and thought about it then replied “hmmm, he is pretty hot despite being an asshole. Tell you what, I’m down with this idea, but how will we buy the shrink machine? I have a job but that money will run out fast without bonus cash”.

John sat around for about eight minutes and finally came up with a further plan. “I got it, what if you kept me around with you and I was considered dead to the real world, they’d find my “suicide note” where I willed you my remaining money for being such a good friend. Then once we buy the shrink ray, we can pull off this plan and we could stick together”.

Taylor seemed confused but interested “So basically, you want everyone to think you’re dead so that way you can live the rest of your life as my secret boyfriend?” John made up his mind and exclaimed “YES! I would love to live the rest of my life as your secret boy friend… and who knows… maybe we could do each other favors”.

Taylor thought more about it and said “eh, why the hell not? I find you super attractive any ways, lets do this!” and put her fist out for tiny John to fist bump, John went along with it and bumped her fist with his tiny hand. “For the first step, you’re going to have to grow me back so I can write the note and leave it at my house. Do you trust me enough for this?” John asked. “Not really, so I’m going to follow you to make sure you don’t run off”.

After about two hours, Taylor finally grew you back using the machine, she bribed the guy extra to keep quiet. As you both walk out, she pulls you aside “Alright, remember the plan. If you can trick Mark Camron into getting eaten by me, you’ll be my secret boyfriend and I’ll do special favors for you. BUT if you try to betray me, I won’t hesitate to shrink you again and eat you!” John reassures her “No no don’t worry, I can’t guarantee I’ll get him, but I’ll try“.

Taylor kisses John, taking him by surprise. “If you catch him, you’ll be getting more of these in your future. Text me on snapchat so that way our messages won’t save, give me as much info as you can get so we can set up a proper plan when the time comes”. John hugs Taylor closely “I will, I’ll get you your food”. Taylor looks happy but then turns sad “Im uh… I’m sorry for eating your friend John, I just couldn’t resist”. He hugs her again but doesn’t say anything.

As Taylor walked with John to his house, he noticed that no one was home, which made things way easier. He wrote the fake suicide note while Taylor was texting the owner of the shrink machine for a price. After she bought it, she walked around John’s room and looked at his items. “Is there anything you want me to steal from you? I can keep them at my place when you move in,” she offers. “Sure, take my laptop, maybe you can find someone to wipe all its data and make it ours”.

Now that Taylor could see that John was committed to their plan, she let him sleep for the night on his own and returned to her apartment. John’s new plan was to show up to college and bait Mark into meeting him at Taylor’s apartment to fight in front of her and prove themselves to her, this was obviously just to lure him out. But then again, if you wanted out of this… now would be the time to run away.
11113.title: Alternative Target

111131.content:
The next day Mark Camron was at his usual dealing spot, John rushed by him and threw a up of water all over him, he started chasing him until Taylor “conveniently” walked by and stopped Mark, “Were you two about to fight?” She asked. Mark stared John down and replied “We weren’t fighting, he threw water at me and now I’m gonna kill him!” John taunted back “In your dreams, I’m too strong for you meth head”. This really pissed Mark off and made him scream “I DON’T DO DRUGS, I GIVE THEM AWAY!”

Taylor jumped in “I think tough boys are hot, how about this. You two show up to my place after classes today and have a real fight, I’ll have sex with the winner”. Suddenly Mark went from angry to charm “Oh yeah, I’ll show you John, you better prepare because when the time comes, I’ll already have your face turned into a red puddle!” and with that he walked back his drug dealing spot and waited for his client. Taylor walked to class, but she gave me a spare key to get into her apartment. Since I was technically going to be “dead” to the world, I figured I’d just skip class and go back to her place.

After about three hours of watching TV at Taylors place, I heard her car pull up, the radio was blaring rap music which didn’t seem like Taylor’s type. Turns out that Mark was in the car with her and was now coming up to her room. Just then I saw a snapchat notification from Taylor, it said “plug the shrink machine up”. Taylor walked and explained that she got Mark to wait outside while “cleans up the room” but she actually wanted to get the shrink ray ready to fire as he walks in the door.

Once we got the ray set up, she opened the door and called for Mark to come in. “Hey Taylor, just so you know, my dick is about eight inches long, so be ready for a great time after I beat the shit out of that little rat”. Taylor fake flirted back “Oh, I can’t wait to have you inside of me”. At that moment, Mark took a few steps in and was instantly hit by the ray as John took aim.

The shrinking knocked him out similarly to how you got knocked out, but Taylor wanted to eat him while he was awake because “it makes it more sexy feeling them move inside you” according to her. John decided not to judge since she wasn’t going to judge him but he is personally not into it. They held hands and watched TV waiting for Mark to wake up.

After about an hour and a half he woke up, as soon as he stood up Taylor picked him up to make sure that he couldn’t run away. “What the fuck is going on?” Mark yelled out. “Hey Mark, looks like you lost the fight. but luckily for you, I’m still gonna let you inside of me”. Mark tried to sound intimidating but was failing “You better not use me as a dildo, I swear to god, I’ll get my rich family to charge you for rape!”

Taylor just raised his naked body above her head and said “Awww, you’re so cute when you try and act strong. Too bad that food can’t report crime to the cops”. Mark got confused and blurted out “Food? What do you mean Fo-“ Taylor dropped him in her mouth and started enjoying the taste of his body.

Mark tried fighting is way out so Taylor quickly swallowed him before he could do anything. “Aw man, I wish I could have enjoyed him longer, its too bad”. John puts his arm around her “did you enjoy your snack?” Taylor leans down on his shoulder “Yep, I still am, I can feel him in there. I love this feeling”.

After they finished their show, Taylor got up. “I guess I owe you some feet time now huh?” she said as she took off her socks. “Oh I’m so ready for this” John replied. For the rest of that day, John shrunk himself down and spent time cuddling on her feet.
111131.title: continue as planned

12.content: The first thing John noticed was he smell. It was awful! Opening his eyes he found Mike nowhere in sight. There was an opening a few steps ahead of him on the ceiling. He must be in a shoe! Whose shoe?
12.title: John awakes in a shoe. (May be written by anyone)

info.brief_description: A college student volunteers in an experiment which he never thought would end like this.
info.description:
In a day of age where science is the norm, shrinking people shouldn't come to much a shock. At Lanesburg Tech, this college has made that very notion possible. Any student can volunteer to be one of the first shrunk for this demenstration, but one student is "misplaced" by a now goddess like classmate. Both her and him have a secret desire, one far more sinister than the other. Question is, if he chooses to live out his desire, will he live through hers?


Based on a good friend from college. Changed names around and stuff of course lol. Not sure if I should of made it longer, but oh well.
info.pretty_title: You Scratch My Back, I Will Eat Yours
